title: Hitlists browseable + searchable (2012-04 - 2013-08)
description:
This torrent is an easily browseable and searchable plaintext file that lists the contents of the Hitlist Weeklies, excluding the separate 'Adult' and 'Non-English' packs, from 2012-04-11 thru 2013-08-28, making it almost current as of this writing.

---

Unlike <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/Ichthypod_Crane" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/Ichthypod_Crane</a>  's recently posted version ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8900639" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8900639</a>  ), this one is a fully alphabetized list (from "'68" thru "Zorro"), instead of one with a chronological superstructure. 

I'm mainly posting it because there is a disparity in content (IC's has about 32,000 items, mine another 700 additional ones), and it'd probably be prudent to figure out whether that's because of missing entries there or extraneous ones here or...

The principal function of this listing, the way I use it, is merely to find release names. If I were looking for "The Art of Hellboy", say, I'd scroll down to that point in the alphabet (line ~26,500), and voila, there are three versions:

The Art of Hellboy (2003) (digital) (Minutemen-InnerDemons).cbr (45.65 MB)
The Art of Hellboy (2003) (digital) (Son of Ultron-Empire).cbr (128.78 MB)
The Art of Hellboy(2003)(Digital)(Tyrant Lizard King-EMPIRE).cbr (115.61 MB)

Finding download locations for any or all of those versions is another matter, but that's what search engines are for, and feeding those with release names rather than just titles makes them vastly more efficacious. :)
